Package org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor

Interface Summary
AccSelectionListener An AccSelectionListener is a listener that is interested in the selection of acceptance sets (or pairs) in an AccDialog.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAccEditor An AbstractAccEditor is an editor for editing an acceptance condition.
AbstractNBWLikeAccEditor This is a property editor for editing NBW-like acceptance conditions.
AbstractNGBWLikeAccEditor This is an editor for editing NGBW-like acceptance conditions.
AbstractNRWLikeAccEditor This is an editor for editing NRW-like acceptance conditions.
AbstractNTBWLikeAccEditor This is a property editor for editing NTBW-like acceptance conditions.
AbstractNTGBWLikeAccEditor This is a property editor for editing NTGBW-like acceptance conditions.
AbstractNTRWLikeAccEditor This is a property editor for editing NTRW-like acceptance conditions.
AccDialog An AccDialog is a dialog containing an editor suitable for editing the acceptance condition of the active automaton in a specific GOAL window.
AccSetCellRender A AccSetCellRender renders an acceptance set in a javax.swing.JList.
AccSetEditor An AccSetEditor is an editor for editing an acceptance set.
ACTLEditor An ACTLEditor is an editor for ACTL formulae.
AlphabetConversionDialog This is a dialog for editing the mapping between propositional symbols and classical symbols.
AltAutomatonCanvas This is a canvas for alternating automata.
AltAutomatonEditor This is an editor for editing alternating automata.
AltAutomatonPropertyEditor This is a property editor for alternating automata.
AltConnectorPropertyEditor This is a property editor for alternating connectors.
AltStatePropertyEditor This is a property editor for alternating states.
AltTransitionPropertyEditor An AltTransitionPropertyEditor editor is a property editor for alternating transitions.
AutomatonCanvas<T extends Automaton> An AutomatonCanvas is a panel containing an automaton drawer and automaton tools that can draw something.
AutomatonEditor<T extends Automaton> An AutomatonEditor is an editor for automata.
AutomatonPropertyEditor This is a property editor for automata.
BuchiAccEditor This is an editor for Büchi acceptance conditions.
ClassicAccEditor This is an editor for classic acceptance conditions.
CoBuchiAccEditor This is an editor for co-Büchi acceptance conditions.
ConfigurationRunViewer This class provides methods for the visualization of a configuration run InputSimulator.Run.
EditablePropertyEditor This is a property editor for editable objects.
Editor<T extends Editable> An Editor is a panel that can display an editable object and perform some editing.
EditorRepository EditorRepository provides methods for registering editors and accessing registered editors.
FormulaEditor<T extends Logic> A FormulaEditor is an editor for logic formulae.
FSACanvas An FSACanvas is a canvas for FSA.
FSAEditor An FSAEditor is an editor for FSA.
GameCanvas A GameCanvas is a canvas for games.
GameEditor A GameEditor is an editor for games.
GamePropertyEditor A GamePropertyEditor is a property editor for games.
GameStatePropertyEditor A GameStatePropertyEditor is a property editor for game states.
GeneralizedBuchiAccEditor This is an editor for generalized Büchi acceptance conditions.
GraphicComponentPropertyEditor A GraphicComponentPropertyEditor is a property editor for graphic components such as states and transitions.
GraphicComponentSetListModel<T extends GraphicComponent,S extends GraphicComponentSet<T>> A GraphicComponentSetListModel is a sorted javax.swing.ListModel containing a set of graphic components.
InputSimulatorViewer This class provides methods for the visualization of an input simulator.
MullerAccEditor This is an editor for Muller acceptance conditions.
OmegaRegularExpressionEditor An OmegaRegularExpressionEditor is an editor for ω-regular expressions.
ParityAccEditor This is an editor for parity acceptance conditions.
PropertyDialog A PropertyDialog is a dialog that contains a property editor for some object.
PropertyEditor A PropertyEditor is a panel used to edit properties of some object.
QPTLEditor A QPTLEditor is an editor for QPTL formulae.
RabinAccEditor This is an editor for Rabin acceptance conditions.
ReachabilityAccEditor This is an editor for reachability acceptance conditions.
RegularExpressionEditor A RegularExpressionEditor is an editor for regular expressions.
RunDagViewer This class provides methods to visualize a run dag.
RunTreeViewer This class provides methods to visualize a run tree.
ScrollablePanel This class provides a panel that is aware of the movement on a Mac trackpad.
SplitTreeViewer This class provides methods to visualize a split tree.
StateCellRender This is a cell render for states.
StateListModel A StateListModel is a sorted javax.swing.ListModel containing a set of states.
StatePropertyEditor A StatePropertyEditor editor is a property editor for states.
StateSetListModel A StateSetListModel is a sorted javax.swing.ListModel containing a set of state sets.
StreettAccEditor This is an editor for Streett acceptance conditions.
TAccSetCellRender A TAccSetCellRender renders an acceptance set on transitions in a javax.swing.JList.
TAccSetEditor A TAccSetEditor is a dialog for editing an acceptance set on transitions.
TBuchiAccEditor This is an editor for transition Büchi acceptance conditions.
TCoBuchiAccEditor This is an editor for transition co-Büchi acceptance conditions.
TGeneralizedBuchiAccEditor This is an editor for transition generalized Büchi acceptance conditions.
TMullerAccEditor This is an editor for transition Muller acceptance conditions.
TParityAccEditor This is an editor for transition parity acceptance conditions.
TRabinAccEditor This is an editor for transition Rabin acceptance conditions.
TransitionCellRender This is a cell render for transitions.
TransitionListModel A TransitionListModel is a sorted javax.swing.ListModel containing a set of transitions.
TransitionPropertyEditor A TransitionPropertyEditor editor is a property editor for transitions.
TransitionSetListModel A TransitionSetListModel is a sorted javax.swing.ListModel containing a set of transition sets.
TStreettAccEditor This is an editor for transition Streett acceptance conditions.
TwoWayAltAutomatonCanvas This is a canvas for two-way alternating automata.
TwoWayAltAutomatonEditor This is an editor for editing a two-way alternating automaton.
TwoWayAltTransitionPropertyEditor A TwoWayAltTransitionPropertyEditor editor is a property editor for two-way alternating transitions.
WordEditor This class provides an editor for the input of a word.
